channel.title: Help for people..(sometimes this is the case)
channel.description:
Some people have routers and question, did they portforward right? Well, I am here to say that some people have routers with network keys..(whats a network key, *a pass to get on the net*) In some cases if you delete the network keys and run your server with your server going and it should work if you do it right.
~Dan
